Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2001 5:36 PM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [junit] Best practice with EJB


  You can poke me every so often so I don't procrastinate. :) Actually, I've
collected a lot of material in the last few weeks, and I just need to polish
it up a bit. I'm not aiming at formal publication or anything... just an
article on junit.org would be the limits of my humble ambition.

  Poke, Poke, Poke, please let me know the Url when you get it done!

  --
  Erik Meade             emeade@...
  Senior Consultant      Object Mentor, Inc.
  http://www.junit.org
